attributes.action: Make school food more affordable for all pupils
attributes.additional_details: The cost of living crisis is crippling for many families and school food is often very expensive
attributes.background: Subsidise school food and meals to ensure that prices are lowered

rejection.details:
We believe that we have a few petitions open on this topic which already address your request, which you might like to sign:

Provide free school meals for ALL school children in England by autumn 2022
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617633

All children in receipt of Universal Credit to receive free school meals
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619561

Review and increase the income thresholds for Free School Meals
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614134
